name: Bob the Robot (Saikik0_0)
description:
GAME MADE WITH GDEVELOP

BOB THE ROBOT

Is a puzzle-platformer game  where you and Bob need to get trough different obstacles in order to reach a mysterious gate.

Bob's only dream is to become a great singer. Only you, the player, can help him achieve his scope!

Will you help him?

CONTROLS

left and right arrow keys-movement

up arrow key-jump

R-restart level

This game was made for the: Wowie Jam 4.0 -with the theme COLLABORATE WITH AI

Credits:

-all assets used were from kenney:https://www.kenney.nl/assets

-background song:https://pixabay.com/music/upbeat-goldfish-111655/

-cool font text:https://www.dafont.com/fluo-gums.font

NOTE: this is my second game jam and i have almost no experience with game dev, also im a 15 yrs old with bad humor.
